name: w3quran
description: A beautiful, interactive Quran application built with React and modern web technologies
author: w3Quran Team

scripts.dev:chat: cd chat-worker && npx wrangler dev --config wrangler.toml --port 8787 --persist-to ../.wrangler/state
scripts.dev:full: npm run build && npx wrangler pages dev dist --port 8788 & cd chat-worker && npx wrangler dev --config wrangler.toml --port 8787 --persist-to ../.wrangler/state
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist && node scripts/purge-cache.js && cd chat-worker && npx wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:pages: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist && node scripts/purge-cache.js
